mapper.select: SELECT *, al.ALBUM_NM FROM MT_SONG s, MT_ALBUM al WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE s.ALBUM_ID = al.ALBUM_ID AND s.SONG_ID = #{SONG_ID}
select * from MNET.dbo.T_CC_ConcertMst WITH(NOLOCK) where ConcertId = #{concertId} and ViewFlag='Y'
select * from vt_theme_master where display_flg = 'y' and master_id = #{master_id}
select * from OA_ALBUM where DISPLAY_FLG = 'Y' and ALBUM_NO = #{ALBUM_NO}
select * from sc_article_mst with(NOLOCK) where DISPLAY_FLG = 'Y' and ARTICLE_ID = #{ARTICLE_ID} and ARTICLE_STATE=3

select clip.*, p.* from VT_PROGRAM_CLIP clip WITH(NOLOCK), VT_PROGRAM p WITH(NOLOCK) where clip.PROGRAM_ID = p.PROGRAM_ID and clip.DISPLAY_FLG = 'Y' and p.DISPLAY_FLG = 'Y' and clip.CLIP_ID = #{CLIP_ID}
SELECT * FROM VT_PROGRAM WHERE DISPLAY_FLG = 'Y' AND PROGRAM_ID = #{PROGRAM_ID}
